Who is HostMantis?

HostMantis specializes in making reliable hosting affordable. Offering fast and reliable web hosting at a great price is our passion and always will be. Whether it be shared web hosting or reseller web hosting, you can rest assured you are receiving the best possible price and service with HostMantis!

Our locations include: USA, Canada, Germany, France, UK, Singapore and Australia
